ing: 3 ounces dark chocolate bar with almonds, broken into pieces
des: "Hot chocolate without all the guilt. For adults, spike the hot chocolate with KahluaÂ®."
ins: Stir coconut water and dark chocolate together in a saucepan over medium heat until chocolate melts. Sift cocoa powder into the chocolate mixture, stirring constantly, until mixture simmers, about 5 minutes. Pour into mugs and top with marshmallows.
